DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether astaxanthin ( ASX ) supplementation reduce obesity-induced oxidative stress improve lipid profile overweight obese adult .
DOC.brief_title: Positive Effects Haematococcus Astaxanthin Oxidative Stress Lipid Profile Overweight Obese Adults
DOC.criteria: Subjects BMI 25.0 kg/m2 Nonsmoker Excessive alcohol consumption Pregnant lactate woman Dyslipidemia , hyperglycemia , chronic disease . Subjects take vitamin supplement
